about_the_game:
Catching pets in a Battle Royale? Absolutely! In Farlight 84, you get to play as heroes with unique skills to outsmart your enemies, unleashing special abilities to catch them off guard... AND you get to collect adorable Buddies to join you as loyal companions in battle.
Buddy up, it’s time to Battle Royale!

Buddy Orb - Catch Anything
Just aim and throw--Buddy Orb lets you store vehicles, bunkers, and adorable Buddies, making them ready to deploy at critical moments.

Bunkers - Portable Tactics
Deploy them anytime by storing these bunkers in a Buddy Orb. Then choose the ideal weapon to overcome terrain disadvantages. Don't worry about being caught out in the open anymore.

Buddies - Summon to Battle
Buddies are more than just adorable—they're powerful assets in battle. Perform rescues from afar, redefine safe zones, or blast yourself away from danger... Anything is possible!

Heroes - Roles to Play
Farlight 84 features four distinct roles and dozens of cool-looking heroes. Select one to complement your squad and strategize—it's okay to not aim well, use your skills!

Jetslide - Show Your Move
Eager to flaunt your movement skills in Battle Royale? Here's your chance. Jetslide your way down the slope to confuse your enemies. Defeat them before they even know you're there.

Skill Tree - Level...UP!
A unified level-up experience. Fight to level up, and assign skill points to activate unique skill effects as you advance within a match. Feel your growth in every single game!

Weapons - Loot & Upgrade
Shotguns, sniper rifles, assault rifles, SMGs... With realistic 3D models and a wide range of firearms, you're in for an intense shooter experience. Also: hidden weapons waiting to be discovered in Airdrops!

One Account. Cross-platforms
Farlight 84 is fully cross-compatible. Rally your friends for cross-platform action anytime, anywhere, and watch your friendship levels skyrocket!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 CPU or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
